name: OpenBuild
fullText:
468 of you wanted to be there.That number hit us hard. 💯

Builder's Night #4 wasn't just an event—it was proof that our community is HUNGRY for spaces where builders can be themselves, share ideas & form real connections.

To the 100+ who made it:
You brought the energy. You https://t.co/dar80JnYeE
